algorithm_technique: Iterate through the grid, count servers per row/column, then count servers with >1 connection.
problem_summary_simple: Count servers that can communicate with at least one other server in the same row or column.
problem_summary_technical: Uses auxiliary arrays to store row and column server counts, then iterates through the grid to identify communicating servers.
key_insights: Pre-calculating row and column sums simplifies the communication check.
A server communicates if its row or column has more than one server.
The problem can be solved in a single pass to count sums, followed by another pass to count results.
